example.eg: As the graphic designer, Sarah had to design a custom format for the web and the print version of the magazine.
example.egtrans: 作为图形设计师，莎拉必须给杂志的网络版和印刷版都定制版式。

dsense.name: format
dsense.guideword: (computers: file type) (计算机：文件类型（档案类型）)

example.eg: John couldn't open the file because Tim sent it to him in the wrong format.
example.egtrans: 约翰打不开那个文件，因为蒂姆发给他时用了错误的格式。

example.eg: The periodical is available in print and CD formats.
example.egtrans: 这期刊有印刷和光盘版本。

example.eg: This game show is hugely popular; the format has been sold to dozens of countries worldwide.
example.egtrans: 这档游戏节目特别受欢迎，节目形式已经出售到全球多个国家和地区。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 节目模式, 节目形式

example.eg: The school offered the class in a variety of formats.
example.egtrans: 学校里的课有多种形式。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 形式, 方式, 风格

example.eg: Paul formatted the hard drive of his computer before giving it to his son.
example.egtrans: 保罗把电脑的硬盘格式化后交给了他的儿子。

example.eg: Jane had to teach the writing students how to format a cover letter.
example.egtrans: 简需要指导学习写作的学生如何来设计求职信。
